info.title: Episode Api's

parameters.name: deactivate_action
parameters.description: 0=>only report filed will b removed,1=>user will deactivated and filed fill be removed

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: if rating declined ,then this filed is required

parameters.name: user_type
parameters.description: user type (status field in table(active,inactive,not varified))

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: filter by start date in timestemp

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: filter by end date in timestemp

parameters.name: Body
parameters.description: episode_id only in case of watch episode,type=>1:story,2:episdoe

parameters.name: episode_id
parameters.description: used only on edit episode id

parameters.name: Body
parameters.description: user_type = writer or reader, dob = timestemp

post.description: device_type = IOS or ANDROID,user_type = writer or reader

parameters.description: if you want only uer data
